actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to provide an income tax exemption for certain mutual benevolent insurance associations.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an income tax exemption for mutual benevolent insurance associations which: (1) operate exclusively for the benefit of members of a particular church or religious denomination; (2) provide for the payment of life, sick, accident or other benefits to members of such association; (3) do not distribute earnings to the benefit of any private individual; and (4) do not have gross income in excess of $2,500,000 per year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code to provide an income tax exemption for certain mutual benevolent insurance associations.
